task.title: Orchestrator Core Implementation — Persist run artifacts and logging

mode.reason: Local persistence integration requires only filesystem access.

artifacts.description: Diff wiring persistence coordinator into TaskManager and adding integration test

notes.summary: Connected TaskManager to the persistence coordinator with default wiring and added integration coverage validating manifest/state writes.
risks: Persistence writes run asynchronously—consider explicit await hooks if future callers need stronger guarantees.
follow_up: Implement cloud-sync worker subscriber that consumes the new persistence outputs.
